summary.body: Holmes Place Barbican has been trying to put my Gold/Link membership up to 980 per year on the basis that that is their usual membership.  I've resisted and they have now come in with a better offer but I'd be grateful to hear from others about what they pay, particularly if there is anyone with an ancient membership which was supposed to give a permanent discount. Also, since Holmes Place often raises my blood pressure as much as it's supposed to lower it, does anyone have strong recommendations for alternatives.  Is Champneys still hugely expensive?
summary.subject: Gym fees

summary.body: Regaurding the route would it not be an abvantage if this bus instead of turning rt at Aldersgate,where it joins other bus routes ,carried on down Long Lane stoppiing near Neiman practice,Barts Hospital, turn north at Poultry market(t John st(restaurants and shopping) and then continued to Islington etc.This route would surely be of advantage to all and not duplicate others already available? Comments please
summary.subject: 153 bus
